text: Oliver Kjærgaard (born 2 May 1998) is a Danish footballer, who plays as a midfielder for Danish 1st Division club FC Helsingør. ==Club career== ===Lyngby BK=== Kjærgaard got his debut at the age of 17, on 8 December 2015 against AB in the Danish Cup, that Lyngby won 3-0. He came on the pitch in the 61nd minute, where he replaced Oke Akpoveta. He did also play 2 games for the club in that season, in the Danish 1st Division. On 24 September 2016 Lyngby BK confirmed, that they had extended Kjærgaard's until 2019. But he continued playing for their U19 squad. He played his first match in the Danish Superliga on 31 March 2017 against FC Nordsjælland. Due to the economic situation of Lyngby in 2018, he terminated his contract on 9 February 2018. ===Tromsø IL=== After leaving the club, he went on a trial at Tromsø IL. He signed officially for the club on 22 February 2018. He played his first game for the club in a 4-1 victory on 28 April 2018 against Sandefjord, where he entered the pitch in the 76th minute.TROMSØ VS. SANDEFJORD 4 - 1, soccerway.com, 22 April 2018 After playing only two games for Tromsø, Kjærgaard was loaned out to Nest- Sotra on 2 August 2018. He idea was, that he should act as a replacement for Johnny Furdals.Oliver Kjærgaard klar for Nest-Sotra, nestsotra.no, 2 August 2018 The deal was for the rest of the year. The deal was terminated on 2 January 2020.Tidligere Lyngby-spiller ophæver i Norge, bold.dk, 2 January 2020 ===FC Helsingør=== Kjærgaard returned to Denmark and trained with FC Helsingør in about a month. On 5 March 2020 the club confirmed, that Kjærgaard had signed a contract until the end of the season.FC HELSINGØR SKRIVER MED OLIVER KJÆRGAARD, fchelsingor.dk, 5 March 2020 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" |Lyngby |2015–16 |rowspan="1" |NordicBet Liga |2||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||2||0 |- |2016–17 |rowspan="2" |Danish Superliga |3||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||3||0 |- |2017–18 |3||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||3||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !8!!0!!0!!0!!-!!-!!8!!0 |- |rowspan="3" |Tromsø |2018 |rowspan="2" |Eliteserien |2||0||2||1||colspan="2"|-||4||1 |- |2019 |2||0||2||3||colspan="2"|-||4||3 |- !colspan="2"|Total !4!!0!!4!!4!!-!!-!!8!!4 |- |rowspan="2" |Nest-Sotra (loan) |2018 |rowspan="1" |OBOS-ligaen |12||1||0||0||colspan="2"|-||12||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !12!!1!!0!!0!!-!!-!!12!!1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !24!!1!!4!!4!!-!!-!!28!!5 |} ==References== ==External links== * Oliver Kjærgaard on Soccerway * Oliver Kjærgaard on DBU * Oliver Kjærgaard at Tromsø IL Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Danish Superliga players Category:Danish 1st Division players Category:Danish 2nd Division players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Lyngby Boldklub players Category:Tromsø IL players Category:Nest- Sotra Fotball players Category:FC Helsingør players Category:Denmark youth international footballers Category:Danish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Danish expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:People from Fredensborg Municipality
